name: loop(self);
description:
Stuck inside a loop you wonder: Can you survive facing yourself, again and again?

Try and see how many times you can survive in this arcade style shooting game!

Graphics from https://kenney.nl/.

Music: Prelude and Action by Kevin MacLeod
Link: https://incompetech.filmmusic.io/song/4236-prelude-and-action
License: http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by/4.0/

Made for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a loop.
